text: "Does That Blue Moon Ever Shine on You" also known as "Blue Moon" is a 1996 song by country singer Toby Keith and is the leading single to his third studio album Blue Moon. It went to number 2 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart and number 9 on the Canadian RPM Country Tracks chart. ==References== Category:1996 songs Category:Country songs Category:Toby Keith songs
title: Does That Blue Moon Ever Shine on You
